content: संनिधानं, संनिधिः {@--1@} Putting down together, juxta-position. {@--2@} Proximity, vicinity, presence; <ls>N. 2. 53.</ls> {@--3@} Perceptibility, appearance. {@--4@} A receptacle. {@--5@} Receiving, taking charge of. {@--6@} Combination, aggregate; <ls>Pt. 1. 191.</ls> {@--7@} Depositing. {@--8@} The object of an organ of sense (इंद्रियविषय).
